code:
%% Sequence Diagram – Issue Document with Automated Backup & Opportunistic Cloud Sync
%% Actors: Secretary (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream), System services; aligns to Option B schema

sequenceDiagram
	autonumber
	actor Secretary
	participant UI as User Interface
	participant Auth as AuthService
	participant Iss as IssuanceService
	participant PDF as PdfService
	participant FS as FileSystem
	participant Repo as DB/Repository
	participant Bkp as BackupService
	participant Cloud as CloudSyncService

	Secretary->>UI: Login(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
	UI->>Auth: authenticate(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
	Auth-->>UI: auth result
	UI-->>Secretary: login success

	Note over Secretary,UI: Start issuance
	Secretary->>UI: Enter requester details, type, purpose
	UI->>Iss: createIssuance(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
	Iss->>PDF: generate(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
	PDF-->>Iss: PDF bytes/path
	Iss->>FS: save PDF artifact
	FS-->>Iss: path + fileHash
	Iss->>Repo: save IssuanceRecord + Artifact(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
	Repo-->>Iss: confirm IDs
	Iss-->>UI: issuance created + artifact path
	UI-->>Secretary: show preview/print

	UI->>Bkp: queueLocal(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
	Bkp->>FS: copy to backup location
	FS-->>Bkp: copy OK
	Bkp->>Repo: record BackupLog(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
	Repo-->>Bkp: logged
	Bkp->>Cloud: upload(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)  
	Note over Cloud: If offline, enqueue and retry when online
	Cloud-->>Bkp: result (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
	Bkp->>Repo: update BackupLog + Artifact.syncStatus
	Repo-->>Bkp: updated
	Bkp-->>UI: backup status / alerts
	UI-->>Secretary: notify backup/cloud status

	Note over Secretary,Cloud: End of issuance flow

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 的分支。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController处理。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController处理'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 的逻辑。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 的逻辑。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker处理 才对。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker处理'？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode'。
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

extra.repo_description: A transaction‑centric records and document issuance system for Barangay Santol (Silang, Cavite), designed for reliability on limited hardware, with automated local backup and opportunistic cloud sync
